cab.content: MEETING OP MINISTERS held in the Secretaryof state's Room, Foreign Office, on tuesday, 21st December, 1943 at 12.30 p.m.PRESENT:The Right Hon. Anthony Eden, Secretary of Statefor Foreign Affairs (In the Chair)The Right Hon. Viscount Simon, Lord Chancellor.Colonel the Right Hon. Oliver Stanley,Secretary of State for the Colonies.The Right Hon. Sir Andrew Duncan,Minister of Supply.The Right Hon. Hugh Dalton, President of theBoard of Trade.The Right Hon. R.S. Hudson, Minister ofAgriculture and Fisheries.Colonel the Right Hon. J.J. Llewellin,Minister of Food.The Right Hon. Sir William Jowitt,Minister without Portfolio.The Right Hon. Lord Portal,Minister of Works.The Right Hon. the Earl of Selborne,Minister of Economic Warfare.The Right Hon. W.S. Morrison,Minister of Town and Country Planning.The Right Hon. Ernest Brown,Chancellor of the Duchy of Lancaster.Captain the Right Hon. H.F.C. Crookshank,Postmaster-General.The Right Hon. Richard Law,Minister of State.The Right Hon. Sir Walter Womersley,Minister of Pensions.The Right Hon. James Stuart,Chief Whip.The Secretary of State for Foreign Affairs gave theMeeting an account of the political aspects of the conferences at Cairo and Teheran.
